transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: haji
Executive: haji Dheeraj ji baat kar rahe hai se se sir good afternoon main Reshu baat kar rahi hu India Mart se
Customer: ji aur sir morning mein bhi call kiya tha na aapne ek wo abhi resolve ho gaya madam
Executive: hello usi ke liye aap ek bar aur ek bar aur khol leta hu ruk jao ek second uske baad time nahi mil paya wo khula nahi khul gaya madam ab to khul gaya
Executive: to abhi to koi issue face nahi kar rahe hai na sir
Customer: nahi nahi ab koi issue face nahi hai theek hai
Executive: baki sir aapko ek by lead mein bhi kuch concern face kar rahe the na aapko by lead mein issue aa raha tha sir aapne matlab wo by lead khul nahi khul nahi raha tha isme wo ab khul gaya
Executive: acha acha abhi by lead open nahi sir aap na hamesha jab bhi matlab by lead vagera check karte ho na to apne primary number se hi login kare matlab jo login rehta hai na wo primary se hi hoke aata hai baki agar jaise kuch aap secondary number ya koi another number dalenge na to wo fir matlab open agar hoga bhi to by lead vagera consume nahi kar paoge wo matlab aisa matlab dummy account hi aap dekh payenge usko by kyuki wo active account nahi hoga na aapka
Customer: theek hai
Executive: iske alava sir main ye fir concern close kar sakti hu main aapka sir ye jo aaya tha
Customer: ha ha ha do koi nahi sir
Executive: theek hai baki kuch issue rahe concern rahe to aap mujhe same number pe call kar lijiyega sir theek hai
Customer: theek hai
Executive: theek hai thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was facing issue with buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive informed to login with primary number.
- Executive confirmed issue is resolved.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, login, primary number
